SceneId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the scene.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [a-zA-Z_0-9][a-zA-Z_\-0-9]*[a-zA-Z0-9]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the scene.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:((aws)|(aws-cn)|(aws-us-gov)):iottwinmaker:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:[\/a-zA-Z0-9_\-\.:]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the scene.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 512   

Update requires: No interruption

ContentLocation.description: The relative path that specifies the location of the content definition file.
ContentLocation.markdownDescription:
The relative path that specifies the location of the content definition file.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: [sS]3://[A-Za-z0-9._/-]+  

Update requires: No interruption
